overview: Boris Silver was the Co-founder and CEO of Sport Interactiva â€” a global maker of sports applications on social networks like Facebook and Bebo with popular applications like Total Sports Fan and Premier League Fantasy Football. Sport Interactiva was acquired by Citizen Sports in 2008. Sport Interactiva was an alumni of the Wharton Venture Initiation Program, which is Wharton’s startup incubator. Boris is now a junior at The Wharton School, University of Pennsylvania after returning from a leave of absence to run Sport Interactiva as CEO full time. In 2007, Boris was named a Wharton Ambassador of Entrepreneurship.
